channel.title: How can i make my weapon perform properly
channel.description: please people i have looked in client.java and stuff so i beg you all how can i make my "Lava_Blade" use the same emote as rune scimmy when attacking?

item.title: How can i make my weapon perform properly
item.dc:creator: @Zaron Zaron
item.description:
@Zaron wrote:

ugh well first, i’ve never heard of a “lava blade” and if it’s the item you created you’ll have to find that model you used. Just search for the weapon lava blade or whatever until you see like emotes etc. then just change the emote to the rune skimmy one which is: 451
